Author: rms
Content: If you're submitting a site where you'd like to drive traffic, you should submit to reddit too because reddit really helps out your Pagerank.

Author: staunch
Content: Redirect anyone coming into "jobitems.cn" to a nice page full of your own advertisements. Maybe put a robots.txt for that domain that bans all spiders, or something even more fun. There's no MX record so you should be getting their mail too by default.

Author: Tichy
Content: If you are keeping money until the project is done, couldn't you just make money by investing the money for the time you are keeping it? Also, the people giving you money are already paying that price, because they can't invest the money elsewhere.
